function.name: turboCleaningMode_setValue
function.description: This function is used to activate the turbo cleaning mode on a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to activate the turbo cleaning mode.

predefinedTurboCleaningMode.description: The predefined turbo cleaning mode to activate.
